title: IOT-BASED TECHNOLOGIES FOR PRECISION AGRICULTURE AND  ENVIRONMENTAL MONITORING

configuration.description:
This research presents the d esi gn, development, and simulation of  an integrated IoT-b‚Å†ased syste m for 
precision agr‚Å†iculture and envir‚Å†onmental moni‚Å†toring, addressing critical chall‚Å†enges in resource 
ma‚Å†nag emen t, disaster prevention, and ecosystem health. The project utilizes ESP32 microcontrollers 
simulated through the Wokwi platfor‚Å†m‚Å†,  with cl‚Å†oud-base‚Å†d data integration via Thing‚Å†sB‚Å†oard, to create a 
compre‚Å†hensive monitoring solution spann i n‚Å†g three interc onnected environmental domains: precision 
irrigation manage‚Å†ment, forest fire detection, and wa‚Å†ter quali‚Å†ty assessm‚Å†ent.
